main event: Observers at Edwards AFB, California, sighted a reddish object estimated to be larger than a commercial jet airliner on 6 February 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed at about 70 degrees elevation in the south for approximately 6 hours and 50 minutes., The object was described as brighter than a commercial jet airliner and reddish in color., Jupiter was in the same position as the sighting during the observation., Observers noted its motion was straight across the sky before disappearing due to daylight., One witness was an Air Force trained surface location observer with experience in satellite observation.
sighted object: a reddish object larger than a commercial jet airliner
witness description: one Air Force trained surface location observer
